Object Flight Path: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
divs: Sighting DetailsStanding on the balcony of my hotel. Tonight is a crystal clear night with no clouds. I noticed the 2 red glows appear from a building not far from my hotel. At first I thought it was a plane heading towards my hotel. It was 2 red glows with white circles around the glow. I ran inside the hotel from my balcony to get my phone and the 2 lights seem to be getting farther and farther away almost seeming to be heading towards space. I had never seen anything so amazing... I know it sounds stupid but I know what I saw. I lost sight when it seemed to be gone an out of sight (heading into space in seconds)
